core/alerts/alert-info:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
components/products/single-image:
{{> components/common/share-buttons settings.add_this inline-facebook-like=false url=product.url title=product.title image=(getImage product.main_image '600x1200' (cdn theme_settings.default_image)) }}
{{#if product.main_image}}
{{> components/products/gallery/product-slideshow isolate-image=theme_settings.product-slider-isolate-images }}
{{else}} {{/if}}
{{> components/products/gallery/product-thumbnails}}
components/products/reviews:
{{lang 'product.reviews.number_reviews' total=reviews.total}} {{#if reviews.list.length}} {{lang 'product.reviews.hide_reviews'}} {{else}} {{lang 'product.reviews.write_review'}} {{/if}}

{{{snippet 'reviews'}}} {{#if reviews.list.length}}
{{#each reviews.list}} {{> components/products/single-review this product_title=../product_title}} {{/each}}
{{lang 'product.reviews.write_review'}}
{{> components/common/pagination pagination.reviews is_grid=true}}
{{/if}}
components/products/related:
{{lang 'product.related_products'}}

{{#each grid}} {{> components/products/product-item this layout="masonry" show_quick_shop=../show_quick_shop default_image=../default_image}} {{/each}}
layout/base:
<!doctype html>
<!--[if IE 9 ]><html class="no-js ie9 lt-ie10" lang="{{ locale_name }}"><![endif]-->
<!--[if (gt IE 9)|!(IE)]><!--><html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}"><!--<![endif]-->
<head>

  <title>{{head.title}}</title>

  {{{head.meta_tags}}}
  {{{head.config}}}

  <link href="{{head.favicon}}" rel="shortcut icon">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
  {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}
  {{ getFontsCollection }}

  {{{head.scripts}}}
  {{{head.rsslinks}}}

  {{> components/common/global-injects}}

  {{{snippet 'html_head'}}}

  {{> core/structured-data/website}}
</head>

<body
  class="{{> components/common/body-class}}"
  data-layout="{{theme_settings.product-grid-layout}}"
>

  {{#if page_type '===' 'product'}}
    {{> components/common/facebook-like}}
  {{else if page_type '===' 'blog_post'}}
    {{> components/common/facebook-like}}
  {{/if}}

  {{{snippet 'header'}}}

  {{> components/header}}

  <main class="main-content">
    {{#if template_file "!==" "pages/home"}}
      {{> components/common/banners banners=banners.top type='top'}}
    {{/if}}

    {{#block "page"}}{{/block}}

    {{> components/common/banners banners=banners.bottom type='bottom'}}
  </main>

  {{> components/navigation-header}}
  {{> components/footer}}
  {{> components/footer-modals}}

  {{> core/structured-data/breadcrumbs}}

  <script src="{{cdn '/assets/js/bundle.js'}}"></script>
  <script>
    // Exported in app.js
    window.stencilBootstrap("{{template_file}}", {{jsContext}}).load();
  </script>
  {{{footer.scripts}}}

  {{{snippet 'footer'}}}
  </body>
</html>
components/common/breadcrumbs: {{#if this.hide_last}} {{#each this.list}} {{#unless @last}} {{> components/common/breadcrumbs-partial this}} {{/unless}} {{/each}} {{else}} {{#each this.list}} {{> components/common/breadcrumbs-partial this}} {{/each}} {{/if}}
components/common/share-buttons:
{{#each buttons}} {{#if service '===' 'twitter'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'facebook'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'linkedin'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'email'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'google_plusone'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'print'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'pinterest'}} {{#if ../../image}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{/each}} {{#if inline-facebook-like}} {{#each buttons}} {{#if service '===' 'facebook_like'}}
{{/if}} {{/each}} {{/if}}
{{#unless inline-facebook-like}} {{#each buttons}} {{#if service '===' 'facebook_like'}}
{{/if}} {{/each}} {{/unless}}

{{product_title}}
{{> components/common/rating rating=rating}}

{{title}}

{{#if name}} {{lang 'product.reviews.posted_on_by' date=date name=name}} {{else}} {{lang 'product.reviews.posted_on' date=date}} {{/if}}

{{{this.text}}}
